member.name: D2D1_RADIAL_GRADIENT_BRUSH_PROPERTIES
member.summary: Contains the gradient origin offset and the size and position of the gradient ellipse for an .

member.name: D2D1_RADIAL_GRADIENT_BRUSH_PROPERTIES.center
member.summary: In the brush's coordinate space, the center of the gradient ellipse.

member.name: D2D1_RADIAL_GRADIENT_BRUSH_PROPERTIES.gradientOriginOffset
member.summary: In the brush's coordinate space, the offset of the gradient origin relative to the gradient ellipse's center.

member.name: D2D1_RADIAL_GRADIENT_BRUSH_PROPERTIES.radiusX
member.summary: In the brush's coordinate space, the x-radius of the gradient ellipse.

member.name: D2D1_RADIAL_GRADIENT_BRUSH_PROPERTIES.radiusY
member.summary: In the brush's coordinate space, the y-radius of the gradient ellipse.
